span.p: Governor DeWine has ordered the closure of K-12 schools through the end of the school year. We will continue with remote learning during that time.

div.span: "We provide an inspiring education that strengthens and prepares our students for unlimited future opportunities."

td.p: Welcome to the 2019-2020 school year! I hope everyone enjoyed a restful summer. I am extremely honored to have been selected by the Board of Education as your new Superintendent. I look forward to working with district staff to continue providing a quality learning experience for our students as they explore their interests and find their true passions.

The community of Austintown has deep rooted history and traditions that I look forward to carrying on as we progress into the future. I will work closely with our board and meet with all stakeholders to gain insight on how we can best support each other during this period of growth.

We all play a role in the success of our students and as your superintendent, I plan to be accessible and maintain an open door communication policy. Please feel free to contact me with any questions, comments or concerns you may have at 330-797-3900 ext. 1510.
I look forward to many exciting years to come.
